voice_instruct: A deep, weathered baritone of a man in his fifties, heavy with authority and buried grief, a warlord turned statesman confessing sins with the gravity of someone who burned cities and now builds covenants

tracks.title: The Blackthorn
tracks.prompt: epic progressive rock with thunderous war drums and heavy distorted guitar riffs, martial and devastating, the sound of an unstoppable conqueror, relentless forward momentum
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
They gave me a name on the fields of Gavilar's ambition
Blackthorn, the brother who turned warfare to religion
I walked through armies like a storm through paper walls
And left a trail of kingdoms in the wake of my footfalls

[chorus]
I am the Blackthorn, the blade of Alethkar
I am the Blackthorn, I've shattered every bar
Between a man and violence there is no line
When the Thrill is singing and the blood tastes like wine

[verse 2]
Gavilar made the speeches, I made the silences
The silence after battle when the field is full of fences
Made of broken bodies, men who someone loved
But the Thrill kept pumping and I couldn't get enough

[chorus]
I am the Blackthorn, the blade of Alethkar
I am the Blackthorn, I've broken every star
That any soldier wished upon the night before I came
The Blackthorn doesn't conquer, the Blackthorn is the flame

[bridge]
But every flame burns out
And every conqueror sits alone
In a room full of the memories
Of the cities he has sown
With ashes

[chorus]
I was the Blackthorn, the blade of Alethkar
I was the Blackthorn, but that man's gone too far
The monster in the mirror wears my younger face
And I cannot remember how to put him in his place

tracks.title: Evi
tracks.prompt: devastating slow progressive rock ballad with aching strings and quiet piano, grief made into music, a requiem for a wife murdered by her own husband's ambition
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
She came from Iri with her golden hair and gentle hands
A political arrangement from the western Riran lands
I didn't love her then, too full of war and Thrill
She deserved a husband, not a man built just to kill

[chorus]
Evi, I burned the city with you inside
Evi, the Thrill was singing and my honor died
I can't remember your face, the Almighty took it away
But I remember the fire every single day

[verse 2]
She gave me Adolin with sunlight in his smile
She gave me Renarin with wisdom all the while
I gave her nothing but a husband gone to war
A man who couldn't love her, always craving more

[chorus]
Evi, I burned the city with you inside
Evi, the Thrill was screaming and my soul died
I asked to have the memories taken, scoured clean
But the absence is a wound where your face should have been

[bridge]
Cultivation cut you from my mind
But she left the guilt, the burning kind
A hole shaped like a woman I forgot to love
Until she was ash rising above

[chorus]
Evi, I burned the city with you inside
Evi, I will carry this until I've died
The Blackthorn's greatest victory
Was the night he became the monster in the story

tracks.title: The Thrill
tracks.prompt: intense progressive rock with dissonant crescendos and pounding tribal drums, the music itself feels addictive and dangerous, seductive heaviness that makes you want to give in
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
It starts beneath the ribs, a heat that isn't mine
A singing in the blood that crosses every line
The Thrill is not emotion, it's a god's intoxicant
Nergaoul wrapped around my soul, a parasite in a chant

[chorus]
The Thrill is calling, the Thrill is here
The Thrill turns cowardice into no fear
The Thrill turns men into instruments of war
And I was its greatest weapon, asking always for more

[verse 2]
In battle everything is simple, blade and bone
No politics, no grief, no sitting on a throne
Just the red song rising and the bodies at my feet
The Thrill made murder feel like a heartbeat

[chorus]
The Thrill is calling, the Thrill is here
The Thrill turns mercy into disappear
The Thrill turns fathers into weapons of the crown
And I let it ride me, let it burn my city down

[bridge]
I didn't know it was an Unmade
I thought the battle-joy was just my own
But the monster feeding on my rage
Was never me, I was never alone
And knowing that is somehow worse

[chorus]
The Thrill is silent now, the Thrill is gone
But I still hear the echo of its song
And every time I lift a blade in honest fight
I wonder if the singing will return tonight

tracks.title: The Way of Kings
tracks.prompt: majestic progressive rock with complex arrangements, layered keyboards and guitar interplay, building through movements like a symphony condensed, scholarly and powerful
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I found the book in ruins of a life I'd left behind
Nohadon's words like water on the wasteland of my mind
Life before death, the first time that the words had weight
A drunken warlord reading by the light of his estate

[chorus]
The way of kings is not the way of war
The way of kings is what you're living for
I read the words a hundred times and still they crack me open
The way of kings is every oath I've spoken

[verse 2]
The most important step a man can take is the next one
Not the first, not the last, the one when you want to be done
Nohadon walked from Abamabar through the desolation's face
To prove that leaders lead by walking, not by taking place

[chorus]
The way of kings is not the way of war
The way of kings is what you're bleeding for
I held this book while my kingdom fell apart
And it rebuilt me, page by page, heart by heart

[bridge]
The lighteyes mock my reading, say a man should fight not think
But I've done enough fighting and I've stood on every brink
The way of kings is knowing when the blade must rest
And the mind must carry what the arm cannot best

[chorus]
The way of kings is not the way of swords
The way of kings is found in ancient words
I'll unite instead of conquer, build instead of burn
The way of kings is what the Blackthorn had to learn

tracks.title: Unite Them
tracks.prompt: soaring epic progressive rock with choir-like vocal harmonies and massive orchestral guitar layers, a rallying cry turned hymn, commanding and stirring
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
The Stormfather spoke in thunder and in grief
Honor is dead, he said, beyond belief
But Honor's dying wish was etched in stone
Unite them, echoing from the Almighty's throne

[chorus]
Unite them, the dead god whispered to the sky
Unite them, before the last Desolation's nigh
The Blackthorn heard the order and he understood
Not through conquest this time, but through something good

[verse 2]
I knelt before the nations and I opened up my hands
Azir, Thaylenah, Iri, all the scattered lands
A warlord asking allies, not demanding their submission
The hardest battle I have fought, swallowing my ambition

[chorus]
Unite them, across every border drawn in blood
Unite them, before Odium brings the flood
The coalition is a fragile, fracturing thing
But it's the only chance this world has left to bring

[bridge]
They say I hear voices, they say I've gone mad
A highprince who talks to storms, the worst Kholin ever had
But the Stormfather and I have bound our oath
And I will unite this world, or die for the growth

[chorus]
Unite them, I'll stand before the kings and queens
Unite them, show them what a Bondsmith means
The man who burned the world will be the one to mend
Unite them, from beginning to the end

tracks.title: Oathbringer
tracks.prompt: climactic progressive rock with crushing dynamics, alternating between brutal heavy sections and transcendent melodic passages, a man confronting the worst version of himself
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I stood before the Stormfather as Odium showed my sin
Every murder, every fire, every city I'd marched in
He offered me release, said give me all your pain
Let me carry your remorse and be the Blackthorn once again

[chorus]
I am the one who will take responsibility
I am the monster and the man who set them free
You cannot have my pain, Odium, it's mine
My pain is the proof that I have crossed the line
And chosen to come back

[verse 2]
The memories returned like fire in reverse
Evi's face, the burning city, every unforgivable verse
Cultivation gave them back so I could face the truth
The Blackthorn and the Bondsmith share the same man's proof

[chorus]
I am the one who will take responsibility
For every broken oath and every cruelty
You cannot have my pain, it is the price I pay
For choosing to be better every single day

[bridge]
The most important step is the next one
Not the first step, not when you are done
The next step after you have burned it all
The next step after the fall

[outro]
You cannot have my pain
You cannot have my pain
I will carry what I've done
I am the Blackthorn's requiem, and I have just begun

tracks.title: Bondsmith
tracks.prompt: expansive progressive rock with cosmic scale, layers building upon layers, orchestral grandeur meeting raw power, a man bonding with the storm itself
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I spoke the words and lightning answered from the sky
The Stormfather, ancient and grieving, asked me why
Why would a mortal bond with something so immense
I said because the world needs someone who makes sense
Of all this scattered honor, all this broken trust
A Bondsmith welds the fractures, turns the rubble back to just

[chorus]
Bondsmith, I bind the oaths that others break
Bondsmith, I mend the world for honor's sake
The Stormfather weeps for what has been undone
And I stand in the storm because I am the one

[verse 2]
I open perpendicularities between the realms
I seal the bonds that Odium attempts to overwhelm
The Connection Surge flows through me like a river finds the sea
I feel every oath on Roshar, every broken plea

[chorus]
Bondsmith, I bind the oaths that others break
Bondsmith, I carry more than one man's stake
The Stormfather roars and I roar with him
Two broken beings filling grief to the brim
With purpose

[bridge]
Dalinar Kholin, Blackthorn, Bondsmith, father, king
So many names for one man carrying everything
But the Bondsmith's work is simple at its core
Join what is broken, and make it something more

[outro]
I am the Bondsmith
I am the storm's right hand
And I will hold this world together
As long as I can stand

tracks.title: The Blackthorn's Requiem
tracks.prompt: epic progressive rock finale, sweeping from devastating heaviness to transcendent beauty, a full journey compressed into one song, requiem mass meets stadium rock, the album's emotional apex
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I was a monster and I've never run from that
I burned a city with my wife inside, a fact
That follows me through every hall I build in hope
The Blackthorn is my shadow and we share the same rope

[chorus]
This is the Blackthorn's requiem
A prayer for the man I was and the man I am
Requiem for the conquered and the lost
A funeral hymn for every cost

[verse 2]
My sons forgave me though I don't deserve the grace
Navani loves the man who finally shows his face
The coalition stands because I chose to bleed
Not with a sword, but with the words that kingdoms need

[chorus]
This is the Blackthorn's requiem
A prayer for the monster and the lamb
Requiem for the cities burned to dust
A Bondsmith's oath built on the ruins of trust

[bridge]
Life before death, I've died a thousand times
Strength before weakness, I've committed a thousand crimes
Journey before destination, the hardest truth to own
Is that the journey never ends and you walk it alone
But you walk it
You walk it
You take the next step

[outro]
The Blackthorn's requiem is not a song of sorrow
It is a promise that there's always one more tomorrow
One more step, one more oath, one more chance to mend
The Blackthorn's requiem will never end
